data.text: Mwooneke etu Athumwanihu chinre aya wo unittuna chinene mpaka nineehaniya ashaana a Nlhuku. We ikekhiaye phi chiichammo chiri ihu. Phi chiichammo etu attu o velhaponi chihinonichuwelha aya ukhalhawaya khanonchuwelha Nlhuku.

Ashilhoko aka kinaattuna aka, hii vano phi ashaana a Nlhuku nansho khinachuwaniaa mwaari chinohalha ihu ukhalha. Nansho nihochuwelha wiira Kuristo vanohalha awe uhokolhia ninoowa naakhalha thoko yoyo ukhalhawaya ninowa naamwoona chiri awe.
Paahi etu kila ntu nonkhulhuvelha Kuristo nowiihapiha nrima akhalhe rata thoko Kuristo mwanene chinre awe wo ukhalha makhalhelho orera chinene wo uhitteka.
Kila ntu nowonya noottekelha ikekhia ya Nlhuku, ukhalhawaya uwonya phi uhiya uvarechesha ikekhia.
Ni inyu nhochuwelha wiira Yesu Kuristo aawilhe uthamiha uwonya wihu ni wa yoyo khuuwo uwonya uriwoothe.
Paahi etu ntu nolhutaana ni Kuristo khanowonya, nansho ntu riyoothe nowonya khamwonilhe mena unchuwelha Kuristo.
Paahi etu achishaana a Nlhuku, nhipoterihiye ni ntu riyoothe. Ntu nopanga chittu choombone chinothanana awe Nlhuku, nonteelhiha Nlhuku, thoko Kuristo chinonteelhiha awe Nlhuku.
Ntu riyoothe nowonya yoyo a Nakare, ukhalhawaya Nakare howonya toka machokholhelho. Nansho Mwaana a Nlhuku aawilhe velhaponi uutanganyani mitheko cha Nakare.
Kila ntu ri mwaana a Nlhuku khanothepa uwonya, ukhalhawaya ukumi wo naanano uvahiye awe ni Nlhuku uri nhina mwawe. Tho, khanothepa uwonya ukhalhawaya yoyo phi mwaana a Nlhuku.
Nansho ntu riyoothe hinopanga chittu chinothanana awe Nlhuku ama hinonttuna nhima awe yoyo kahii mwaana a Nlhuku. Vavawo phi novirikana aya ashaana a Nlhuku ni ashaana a Nakare.
Ni nttenga mwiiwilhe inyu toka machokholhelho phi ulha, Nittunaneke naashineneru.

Nihikhalhe thoko Kaini aamwiivilhe nhima awe wo uholhelhiya ni Nakare. Aamwiivilhe wo nlhatu waani? Amwiivilhe ukhalhawaya mitheko cha Kaini chaari cho uhilhoka nansho mitheko cha nhima awe uyo chaari choombone cho unteelhiha Nlhuku.
Paahi etu ashilhoko aka nhishange attu o velhaponi yopangelhakani ichimwa.
Hii nihochuwelha wiira nihommira nookhwa nihokelha uukumini wo nlhatu no waattuna ashihima ihu. Ntu hiri ni nrima wo uttuna yoyo bado ri avariyaka nnookhwani.
Kila ntu nonvenga nhima awe yoyo ntu o niiviho. Ni inyu mwaatti nhochuwelha wiira ntu riyoothe o niiviho kharina ukumi wo uhimalha nhina mwawe.
Hii nihomalha uchuwelha nrima wo uttuna phi ishiyani ukhalhawaya Yesu Kuristo ahokumiha ukumi awe wo nlhatu wihu. Ni hii etu nikumiheke ukumi ihu wo nlhatu na ashilhoko ihu.
Paahi ntu ri ni nhakhu wo velhaponi va amwoonakaru nhima awe ahuvaka, nansho nrima awe uhimwoonelhaka ikiriri, yoyo khanooria wiira nonttuna Nlhuku.
Achishaana aka, uttuna wihu uhikhalhe wo malhoveru nansho ukhalheke uttuna wo ikeekhene ni wo wooniha mitheko.
Paahi etu wo nenno nichuwelheke wiira hii niri nhina ikekhiaye, ni hii ninomaalhiha mirima chihu nihikhalhe ni nipampa mmiholho wa Nlhuku.
Ata yakhalhaka mirima chihu chinonihukumulha wiira nihowonya, nihochuwelha wiira Nlhuku phi mulhupalhe upwaha mirima chihu. Ni yoyo phi nochuwelha kila ittu.
Ashilhoko aka mirima chihu khachinonihukumulha, paahi etu khaninowa naakhalha ni nipampa mmiholho wa Nlhuku.
Ninoowa naapochera ittu iriyoothe ninolhepelha ihu ukhuma uwaannyawe, ukhalhawaya ninowiiwelhelha malhehero awe ni upanga mitheko chinonteelhiha.
Ni malhehero awe phi alha, urumelhelha nchina no Mwaamwanawe, Yesu Kuristo, ni uttunana naashineneru thoko chinre awe wo unihehera.
Ntu neewelhelha malhehero a Nlhuku noolhutaana ni Nlhuku, ni Nlhuku nolhutaana ni uyo. Ni wo nenno ninoochuwelha wiira, Nlhuku nokhalha nhina mwihu wo iphiro yo Iphumu ya Nlhuku vahiye ihu.
